TopicTitle: Moving cargo doors with missiles attached?

Articles.Content: So I found a mod that had a body with two different cargo bays on the sides which opened up to reveal whatever was inside. It looked just like the opening payload on the RAH-66 Comanche. Things could actually be attached to the moving doors and the attached item will move with it, something all my other cargo doors don't do. Unfortunately I lost the mod and don't remember the mod name. I find myself greatly missing it. If anyone knows a mod like this please tell me.

Animated parts in KSP can't move other parts via their animation; there is a mod that permits this, Infernal Robotics; but it will take a considerable amount of work and I believe you will have to use a stack attachnode instead of surface attach nodes.
